name: Grim Legends Collection
description: Enter an enchanting world of dark legends filled with gloomy forests, forbidden temples, and crumbling cities in this fantastic Artifex Mundi trilogy. Save your sister from an ancient curse. Become a healer and rescue the Queen of Eagle Castle from a mysterious illness. Don the mantle of a relentless monster huntress in a corrupted city that seeks redemption. Grim Legends await!
